name: cypress-ui-api-demo
description: Just a demo for fun and giggles with CypressIO doing some awesome UI and API testing

scripts.test:api: npm ci & npm run start:ci & npx cypress --spec 'tests/API/*.spec.js'
scripts.test:ui:chrome: npm ci & npm run start:ci & npx cypress --spec 'tests/UI/*.spec.js' --browser chrome
scripts.test:ui:firefox: npm ci & npm run start:ci & npx cypress --spec 'tests/UI/*.spec.js' --browser firefox

author: AlanZinho
